Sentencas: The infiltration of nanoparticle electrocatalysts into solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) electrodes has been proven to produce a high density of electrochemically active sites, and reduce charge transfer polarization losses for SOFC electrodes.
Titulo: Characterizing Performance of Electrocatalyst Nanoparticles Infiltrated into Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: This is crucial for intermediate temperature operation, as these losses increase greatly at lower temperatures.
Titulo: Characterizing Performance of Electrocatalyst Nanoparticles Infiltrated into Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Nickel-yttria stabilized zirconia (Ni-YSZ) cermets are low-cost, and exhibit excellent stability, but their main disadvantage stems from nickel coarsening and performance loss over their operational lifetimes.
Titulo: Characterizing Performance of Electrocatalyst Nanoparticles Infiltrated into Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Infiltration of electrocatalyst nanoparticles has been shown to mitigate nickel coarsening and the consequent anode degradation.
Titulo: Characterizing Performance of Electrocatalyst Nanoparticles Infiltrated into Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this study, the effects of these infiltrants are observed in a standard Ni-YSZ electrode.
Titulo: Characterizing Performance of Electrocatalyst Nanoparticles Infiltrated into Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In addition to nickel, mixed ionic and electronic conducting (MIEC) phases were infiltrated into Ni-YSZ scaffolds and their performances were characterized using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Characterizing Performance of Electrocatalyst Nanoparticles Infiltrated into Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Cross-sectional microscopy of fractured cells was used to compare electrode microstructure and particle statistics.
Titulo: Characterizing Performance of Electrocatalyst Nanoparticles Infiltrated into Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A model is proposed for how the nanoparticle electrocatalysts improve the anode performance.
Titulo: Characterizing Performance of Electrocatalyst Nanoparticles Infiltrated into Ni-YSZ Cermet Anodes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
